text:
Angry Reflections

<setup: a man walking, agitated, dark street>
<optional narration: Inner turmoil unfolds>
Man: “Damn him!” 

Man: “If it has begun, then it has begun!” 

Man: “How stupid it is! What lies I told!” 

---

<setup: same man, stopping suddenly, deep in thought>
<optional narration: Confusion sets in>
Man: “Did I even glance at the purse?” 

Man: “What have I done for this?” 

Man: “How's that?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist grapples with intense inner turmoil and confusion about his recent actions and their motivations.
